phrases: It is now August,
and Arima has gone to the Interhigh.
Ah!
It is a letter from Arima!
When most business can be done over the phone these days,
letters are unusual.
What is it say, what is it say?
This is a souvenier from the training camp in Nagano.
I will be back on August 5th.
So concise...
But when I opened the envelope,
it smelled ever so faintly of Arima.
It gave me a painful reminder of how much I missed him.
Oh, Arima?
I saw him.
When I went to school for volleyball practice I ran into the kendo team...
I was surprised.
Arima had gotten so much taller that he looked so different, but cool.
If he gets taller with those looks, he would be a model.
*So good looks is all that matters?*
Hey, what is the matter, Yukinon?
Maybe I should join a club too...
What is the matter all of a sudden?
Although we would love to have you on the volleyball team.
Well, I am not doing anything.
Arima does sports and he is getting taller,
and there is so much going on...
But nothing changes with me just sitting here.
Whining about relationships, are you?
I cannot take any more of this when I am not even getting paid.
I am leavin', so I cannot understand that shit.
All right already!
I will stop talking about it!
It is not like you are doing nothing.
You do all that studying.
Yeah but, that would go without saying.
And as for studying, I finished my homework already, so I do not have much to do.
I have more free time now that
I no longer train to show myself off.
Why do not you join?
Yu-ki-non...
Let us copy your homework!!
1000 yen per subject.
No Fair!
How could you?
Are you going to bring money into our friendship?
One good deed deserves another.
Money does not rule everything in the world.
I have had a change of heart about that.
My brains will bring me lots of money.
At this rate, I can be a doctor or lawyer or anything I like.
In any case, these brains are going to earn me an income of twenty or thirty million yen a year.
So I am not going to sell myself short now.
Damn!
This is what is annoying about smart people.
You have really gotten over being Miss Goody-two-shoes.
You used to loan your notes to people all the time,
and had everyone totally fooled.
Hey, then how about the drama club?
Huh?
Drama club?
There is someone who could write the stories.
There is someone who could make the clothes.
The pretty faces.
Me?
And an acting genius.
That is not very flattering.
See, you can do it!
What are you being so amused about?
Then what are YOU going to do?
Oh, I am on the volleyball team, so it has nothing to do with me.
No fair!
No, no, no way!
Our school does not even have a drama club in the first place.
Did you get an idea?
Hey, do not make up stuff we do not need!
Tsubaki's just teasing us!
Bye!
See ya.
Bah-bye!
Later, see ya.
Bye-bye!
We may not be able to see each other for a while.
Okay.
Good luck at the Interhigh!
It is no use.
I told myself I would be apart from Arima for only a little while...
Why do I become hopeless as soon as he is gone?
Three more days...
So depressing...
Two more days...
Yuki-chan, phone call from Isawa-san.
The day before yesterday...
I was hoping you could help...
Sure.
Thanks for coming over.
What is with your face?
You are emitting a strange aura.
I guess even someone with steel nerves like you gets lonely without Arima.
It was like this during the Athletics Festival too.
The moment Arima was gone I became a wreck.
I would been vaguely aware of it, but...
Without the vanity and pride,
I am really a chicken.
I cannot stand myself!
When Arima's doing what he has to do,
I cannot stand that all I can do is sit around moping!
Do not make such a ruckus in someone else's house.
What is wrong with that?
Guys like that kind of girl.
But Arima has rather weird tastes...
What with Asapin and Tsubasa-chan...
*The world is money!*
I do not really know, but I do not think he would like a passive girl like that.
I think it is all right.
It is love because it knocks your heart off balance.
While you are acting cool and having things under control,
it is not true love yet.
That means you value yourself...
You met someone who could even collapse the balance of your heart.
That is why your heart gets stolen.
You are sooo mature!
You are the first person I have ever wanted to call big sister.
Big sister!
If you are going to make fun of me I will stop talking.
Just kidding.
Mahorin, you must be in love now.
Are you going out with him?
I cannot imagine the kind of person you would fall in love with.
What is he like?
A 28-year old dentist.
He is an adult, so I am no match for him at all.
He has composure.
He is kind and strong.
I love him, but I also admire him.
I want to become the kind...
This is the first time I have seen that tough punk Mahorin look so tender.
Love is such a mysterious thing.
The heart is formless and weightless.
It cannot be measured in terms of size or depth.
Although no one has seen its true nature,
it definitely feels pain.
It only responds to a certain person.
Tomorrow...
When tomorrow comes, I can see him.
This will probably be the longest day.
Pero-Pero, let us go play.
The sisters are at practice.
Pero-Pero,
I want to see him.
I want to be with him.
Every waking moment is painful when we are apart.
Maybe I...
Maybe I actually love Arima......even more than I thought?
I was immature...
and so I just had not realized it, but in reality...
In reality, I have always...
Yuki-chan, can you go buy some soy sauce?
Sure.
Pero-pero!
You are my bodyguard.
You would think you would notice, and not walk on by.
I am home.
I am home.
Before me?!
Not the tongue.
Arimaaa!
Arimaaa!
Miyazawa?!
A tackle?!
In any case...
Arima's gained an indefinable sexiness since I saw him last...
You got back early.
Yeah.
I was supposed to come home on the bullet train...
but it looked like they were going to put me
in charge of things like organizing the debriefing,
so I made up an excuse and came home.
Wow.
I did not know you would cheat like that.
Well, the way things were going.
I did not know when I would get to see you...
Are you on vacation for the rest of the summer?
Can we hang out together?
Yeah.
There is some practice,
but it will not take out my whole day anymore.
What have you been doing?
You told me over the phone, but...
I did all my homework!
And I played with my friends, and watched primetime movies,
and visited Grandpa.
That is nice.
But I was really lonely without you!
But Arima,
you have sure gotten taller since I last saw you.
You are head's at a different level, so I did not notice you.
Yeah, it hurt every time I moved my joints.
It was really tough having that happen right before the competition.
How did the competition go?
Oh, I won.
You WON?!
Win?!
Win as in first place?!
You are the number one in kendo in Japan?!?
That is AWESOME!!
Oh wow!
That is so great!
I bet you were so cool!
I wish I could have seen it!
That is awesome!
Great job, Arima!
For a moment, it occured to me that he was so beautiful.
But being with you is better than anything else.
I felt an emotion I would never felt before.
It is spreading throughout my body......and will have me under its control.
How could I have been so indifferent when I was with him before?
He loves me so much...
I cannot even breathe.
Is this possible?
I have fallen in love with...
Miyazawa!
Yo!!
Have you had lunch?
No, just breakfast.
We still have some time before the movie,
so let us go grab a bite.
Freedom!
I feel so happy when I realize I am finally totally free!
What did it feel like to win the Interhigh?
Huh?
Oh, well, you know...
That is it?
You can brag, you know.
The final match was against our school's captain.
Wow!
Our kendo team must be really good.
He had lost the final match last year,
and I would seen him working really hard
for the win this time.
This was only my first year, so I could not help thinking that I wanted him to win.
Arima, you want me to win, do not you.
Abandon such pathetic thoughts.
I have always wanted to go all out against you.
If you hold back even a little bit.
I will do my best!!
Do not interrupt me.
And so you beat down your senpai?
Well, if I had lost even if I had fought seriously,
I was afraid he would take that as an excuse and do it anyway, so...
He gets this weird look in his eyes sometimes!
You are so popular with guys too...
I wonder if this training camp was actually risque?
especially in the locker rooms.
That is it!
Do not say anything else!
Do not even imagine it!
Arima's voice.
His hair.
His expression.
The way he talks.
It is like being immersed in pleasant music.
Uh-oh.
I should not have worn a sleeveless dress.
I get paralyzed just by his gaze.
I cannot imagine Arima was immature like me.
He does not force his feelings so it never dawned on me.
But there were hints of that every so often.
Now that I think about it,
he must have been going along at my pace because I am such a baby.
And I express my feelings like a dog...
I have to tell him.
I love you even more than before.
My heart starts pounding just by being with you.
Oh god that is embarassing.
No!
I have a bad habit of suddenly becoming shy about such things.
I have to express very important feelings.
I am sure he will be really happy.
I am so glad I can make him happy.
But, if I said that what would happen to us afterwards?
Want something to drink?
No thanks.
Oh, sorry.
Wow, that was great!
That final confrontation was awesome!
What should we do now?
Is there anywhere you want to go?
You seem depressed today.
You periodically fall silent?
Oh, no!
That is not it...
Uhm... er... well...
Now, gather your courage and tell him,
Uh, not now...
I will tell you later!
This is bad.
I am sure he thinks something is wrong.
It is just saying I love you.
Why am I so clumsy?
I can do everything else so well...
This is awkward.
But I will tell him.
I want to see his face light up.
Why are you avoiding me?
I am not avoid
You are lying.
You do not say anything, or make eye contact.
Have I done something wrong?
No...
You were so happy yesterday.
Why?
My feelings for Arima are overflowing so much...
I am sorry!
I am sorry, I...
forgive me
IDIOT!
Why cannot you ever say what is important?
I am so useless
Wimp!
Coward!
Liar!
Showoff!
I hate myself!!
I hurt him!
I hurt Arima's feelings!
I know he is afraid of being?
I cannot just leave it like this.
I have to apologize.
I have to get him to understand.
I am not letting you go!
I do not care if you avoid me or hate me.
How long do you think I waited to have you notice me?!
I am not waiting any longer!
I am never going to let you go!
I am sorry I scared you.
I was not avoiding you.
I did not touch you because I was embarassed.
I did not meet your gaze because I did not know what to do.
When I saw you again yesterday after so long, I realized that
I loved you even more than before.
I love you even more than before.
My heart starts pounding just being with you.
I am so happy...
I finally got it out.
I was able to tell Arima.
I am so happy Arima understood me.
We have been going out a long time,
but it feels like it is the first time we told each other of our love.
I get nervous when I am with you too.
It never looks that way...
Even with a girl like me?
Of course.
The person you love is special.
I feel like such a baby...
You must have a tough time.
What?
Oh, nothing.
It is okay.
I am happy every day as long as you are with me.
It was so comfortable being next to Arima...
PREVIEW
Arima-kun came back!
Sis gets really excited.
But he was beginning to have?
And the time has finally come to cross a certain line!
Next time on KareKano: Deepening
Well, I just hope it is not a means of escape.
